data.comment: The match is underway in Zwolle.
Steven Berghuis puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 5, Mark Diemers with an assist there.
At Mac3Park Stadion, Dean Huiberts has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The first-half has come to a close in Zwolle.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Zwolle.
Sam Kersten (Zwolle) has received a yellow card from Bas Nijhuis.
John Stegeman (Zwolle) is making a first substitution, with Mustafa Saymak replacing Clint Leemans.
In the minute 68, An attacking Feyenoord player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Feyenoord have extended their lead to 0-2 courtesy of a Steven Berghuis penalty.
Eliano Reijnders is replacing Mike Van Duinen for Zwolle at Mac3Park Stadion.
In the minute 78, Bram Van Polen for Zwolle has been booked by Bas Nijhuis and receives a first yellow card.
Dick Advocaat is making the team's first substitution at Mac3Park Stadion with George Johnston replacing Bart Nieuwkoop.
Feyenoord make their second substitution with Robert Bozenik replacing Nicolai Jorgensen.
In the minute 85, The away team have replaced Orkun Kokcu with Jens Toornstra. This is the third substitution made today by Dick Advocaat.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-2.
Feyenoord's Jens Toornstra has been booked in Zwolle.
